verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will raise up <S%H5782><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and against <S%H413><s%> them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H3820><s%> of them that rise up <S%H6965><s%> against me, a destroying <S%H7843><s%> wind; <S%H7307><s%>

And will send <S%H7971><s%> unto Babylon <S%H894><s%> fanners, <S%H2114><s%> that shall fan <S%H2219><s%> her, and shall empty <S%H1238><s%> <S%H853><s%> her land: <S%H776><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H7451><s%> they shall be <S%H1961><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her round about. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%>

Against <S%H413><s%> him that bendeth <S%H1869><s%> let the archer <S%H1869><s%> bend <S%H1869><s%> his bow, <S%H7198><s%> and against <S%H413><s%> him that lifteth himself up <S%H5927><s%> in his brigandine: <S%H5630><s%> and spare <S%H2550><s%> ye not <S%H408><s%> her young men; <S%H970><s%> destroy ye utterly <S%H2763><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> her host. <S%H6635><s%>
Thus the slain <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> and they that are thrust through <S%H1856><s%> in her streets. <S%H2351><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> been forsaken, <S%H488><s%> nor Judah <S%H3063><s%> of his God, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> of the LORD <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with sin <S%H817><s%> against the Holy One <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Flee <S%H5127><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and deliver <S%H4422><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his soul: <S%H5315><s%> be not <S%H408><s%> cut off <S%H1826><s%> in her iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> is the time <S%H6256><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> vengeance; <S%H5360><s%> he will render <S%H7999><s%> unto her a recompense. <S%H1576><s%>

Babylon <S%H894><s%> hath been a golden <S%H2091><s%> cup <S%H3563><s%> in the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> that made all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> drunken: <S%H7937><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> have drunken <S%H8354><s%> of her wine; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3196><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> are mad. <S%H1984><s%>

Babylon <S%H894><s%> is suddenly <S%H6597><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> and destroyed: <S%H7665><s%> howl <S%H3213><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> her; take <S%H3947><s%> balm <S%H6875><s%> for her pain, <S%H4341><s%> if so be <S%H194><s%> she may be healed. <S%H7495><s%>

We would have healed <S%H7495><s%> <S%H853><s%> Babylon, <S%H894><s%> but she is not <S%H3808><s%> healed: <S%H7495><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> her, and let us go <S%H1980><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> into his own country: <S%H776><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> her judgment <S%H4941><s%> reacheth <S%H5060><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and is lifted up <S%H5375><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the skies. <S%H7834><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> our righteousness: <S%H6666><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> and let us declare <S%H5608><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> <S%H853><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%>

Make bright <S%H1305><s%> the arrows; <S%H2671><s%> gather <S%H4390><s%> the shields: <S%H7982><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath raised up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H853><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Medes: <S%H4074><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> his device <S%H4209><s%> is against <S%H5921><s%> Babylon, <S%H894><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> it; because <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is the vengeance <S%H5360><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the vengeance <S%H5360><s%> of his temple. <S%H1964><s%>

Set up <S%H5375><s%> the standard <S%H5251><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> make the watch <S%H4929><s%> strong, <S%H2388><s%> set up <S%H6965><s%> the watchmen, <S%H8104><s%> prepare <S%H3559><s%> the ambushes: <S%H693><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath both <S%H1571><s%> devised <S%H2161><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

O thou that dwellest <S%H7931><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> abundant <S%H7227><s%> in treasures, <S%H214><s%> thine end <S%H7093><s%> is come, <S%H935><s%> and the measure <S%H520><s%> of thy covetousness. <S%H1215><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> by himself, <S%H5315><s%> saying, Surely <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> I will fill <S%H4390><s%> thee with men, <S%H120><s%> as with caterpillars; <S%H3218><s%> and they shall lift up <S%H6030><s%> a shout <S%H1959><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee.

He hath made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> by his power, <S%H3581><s%> he hath established <S%H3559><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> by his wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and hath stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> by his understanding. <S%H8394><s%>

When he uttereth <S%H5414><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> there is a multitude <S%H1995><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> in the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> and he causeth the vapors <S%H5387><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> he maketh <S%H6213><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> with rain, <S%H4306><s%> and bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasures. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H214><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> is brutish <S%H1197><s%> by his knowledge; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1847><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> founder <S%H6884><s%> is confounded <S%H3001><s%> by the graven image: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6459><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> his molten image <S%H5262><s%> is falsehood, <S%H8267><s%> and there is no <S%H3808><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in them.
They <S%H1992><s%> are vanity, <S%H1892><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of errors: <S%H8595><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their visitation <S%H6486><s%> they shall perish. <S%H6><s%>

The portion <S%H2506><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> like them; <S%H428><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is the former <S%H3335><s%> of all things: <S%H3605><s%> and Israel is the rod <S%H7626><s%> of his inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is his name. <S%H8034><s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> art my battle axe <S%H4661><s%> and weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war: <S%H4421><s%> for with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and with thee will I destroy <S%H7843><s%> kingdoms; <S%H4467><s%>

And with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider; <S%H7392><s%> and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> and his rider; <S%H7392><s%>

With thee also will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and woman; <S%H802><s%> and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> and young; <S%H5288><s%> and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the young man <S%H970><s%> and the maid; <S%H1330><s%>

I will also break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> with thee the shepherd <S%H7462><s%> and his flock; <S%H5739><s%> and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the husbandman <S%H406><s%> and his yoke of oxen; <S%H6776><s%> and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> captains <S%H6346><s%> and rulers. <S%H5461><s%>

And I will render <S%H7999><s%> unto Babylon <S%H894><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Chaldea <S%H3778><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their evil <S%H7451><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they have done <S%H6213><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> thee, O destroying <S%H4889><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which destroyest <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> and I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and roll thee down <S%H1556><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the rocks, <S%H5553><s%> and will make <S%H5414><s%> thee a burnt <S%H8316><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

And they shall not <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> thee a stone <S%H68><s%> for a corner, <S%H6438><s%> nor a stone <S%H68><s%> for foundations; <S%H4146><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Set ye up <S%H5375><s%> a standard <S%H5251><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> prepare <S%H6942><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her, call together <S%H8085><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Ararat, <S%H780><s%> Minni, <S%H4508><s%> and Ashchenaz; <S%H813><s%> appoint <S%H6485><s%> a captain <S%H2951><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her; cause the horses <S%H5483><s%> to come up <S%H5927><s%> as the rough <S%H5569><s%> caterpillars. <S%H3218><s%>

Prepare <S%H6942><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her the nations <S%H1471><s%> with <S%H853><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Medes, <S%H4074><s%> <S%H853><s%> the captains <S%H6346><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3605><s%> the rulers <S%H5461><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of his dominion. <S%H4475><s%>

And the land <S%H776><s%> shall tremble <S%H7493><s%> and sorrow: <S%H2342><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> every purpose <S%H4284><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be performed <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Babylon, <S%H894><s%> to make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> a desolation <S%H8047><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> an inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>

The mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> have forborne <S%H2308><s%> to fight, <S%H3898><s%> they have remained <S%H3427><s%> in their holds: <S%H4679><s%> their might <S%H1369><s%> hath failed; <S%H5405><s%> they became <S%H1961><s%> as women: <S%H802><s%> they have burned <S%H3341><s%> her dwelling places; <S%H4908><s%> her bars <S%H1280><s%> are broken. <S%H7665><s%>

One post <S%H7323><s%> shall run <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> another, <S%H7323><s%> and one messenger <S%H5046><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> another, <S%H5046><s%> to show <S%H5046><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> his city <S%H5892><s%> is taken <S%H3920><s%> at one end, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%>

And that the passages <S%H4569><s%> are stopped, <S%H8610><s%> and the reeds <S%H98><s%> they have burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> are frightened. <S%H926><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> The daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> is like a threshingfloor, <S%H1637><s%> it is time <S%H6256><s%> to thresh <S%H1869><s%> her: yet <S%H5750><s%> a little while, <S%H4592><s%> and the time <S%H6256><s%> of her harvest <S%H7105><s%> shall come. <S%H935><s%>

Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> me, he hath crushed <S%H2000><s%> me, he hath made <S%H3322><s%> me an empty <S%H7385><s%> vessel, <S%H3627><s%> he hath swallowed me up <S%H1104><s%> like a dragon, <S%H8577><s%> he hath filled <S%H4390><s%> his belly <S%H3770><s%> with my delicacies, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5730><s%> he hath cast me out. <S%H1740><s%>

The violence <S%H2555><s%> done to me and to my flesh <S%H7607><s%> be upon <S%H5921><s%> Babylon, <S%H894><s%> shall the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> say; <S%H559><s%> and my blood <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Chaldea, <S%H3778><s%> shall Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> say. <S%H559><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will plead <S%H7378><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy cause, <S%H7379><s%> and take vengeance for thee; <S%H5358><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5360><s%> and I will dry up <S%H2717><s%> <S%H853><s%> her sea, <S%H3220><s%> and make <S%H853><s%> her springs <S%H4726><s%> dry. <S%H3001><s%>

And Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> heaps, <S%H1530><s%> a dwelling place <S%H4583><s%> for dragons, <S%H8577><s%> an astonishment, <S%H8047><s%> and a hissing, <S%H8322><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> an inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>
They shall roar <S%H7580><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> like lions: <S%H3715><s%> they shall yell <S%H5286><s%> as lions' <S%H738><s%> whelps. <S%H1484><s%>

In their heat <S%H2527><s%> I will make <S%H7896><s%> <S%H853><s%> their feasts, <S%H4960><s%> and I will make them drunken, <S%H7937><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> they may rejoice, <S%H5937><s%> and sleep <S%H3462><s%> a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> sleep, <S%H8142><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> wake, <S%H6974><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
I will bring them down <S%H3381><s%> like lambs <S%H3733><s%> to the slaughter, <S%H2873><s%> like rams <S%H352><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> he goats. <S%H6260><s%>

How <S%H349><s%> is Sheshach <S%H8347><s%> taken! <S%H3920><s%> and how is the praise <S%H8416><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> surprised! <S%H8610><s%> how <S%H349><s%> is Babylon <S%H894><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> an astonishment <S%H8047><s%> among the nations! <S%H1471><s%>
The sea <S%H3220><s%> is come up <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Babylon: <S%H894><s%> she is covered <S%H3680><s%> with the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of the waves <S%H1530><s%> thereof.

Her cities <S%H5892><s%> are <S%H1961><s%> a desolation, <S%H8047><s%> a dry <S%H6723><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and a wilderness, <S%H6160><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H2004><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> dwelleth, <S%H3427><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> doth any son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> thereby. <S%H2004><s%>

And I will punish <S%H6485><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Bel <S%H1078><s%> in Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and I will bring forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his mouth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which he hath swallowed up: <S%H1105><s%> and the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> flow together <S%H5102><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him: yea, <S%H1571><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall fall. <S%H5307><s%>

My people, <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> ye out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of her, and deliver <S%H4422><s%> ye every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the fierce <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And lest <S%H6435><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> faint, <S%H7401><s%> and ye fear <S%H3372><s%> for the rumor <S%H8052><s%> that shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> in the land; <S%H776><s%> a rumor <S%H8052><s%> shall both come <S%H935><s%> one year, <S%H8141><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that in another year <S%H8141><s%> shall come a rumor, <S%H8052><s%> and violence <S%H2555><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> ruler <S%H4910><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> ruler. <S%H4910><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> that I will do judgment <S%H6485><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the graven images <S%H6456><s%> of Babylon: <S%H894><s%> and her whole <S%H3605><s%> land <S%H776><s%> shall be confounded, <S%H954><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her slain <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her.

Then the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the earth, <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is therein, shall sing <S%H7442><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> Babylon: <S%H894><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the spoilers <S%H7703><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> unto her from the north, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
